means: 压下(depress的过去式和过去分词)

word_mean: 压低的：低于正常水平的

sentence.Network_en: When depressed, they dramatically overindulge in chocolate and sweets.
sentence.Network_cn: 情绪低落的时候，她们就疯狂地猛吃巧克力和糖果。

sentence.Network_en: My bulging thighs and flabby stomach made me depressed.
sentence.Network_cn: 我大腿太粗，肚子上也净是赘肉，让我很发愁。

sentence.Network_en: The construction industry is no longer as depressed as it was.
sentence.Network_cn: 建筑业不再像以往那样萧条了。

entry.def: If you are depressed, you are sad and feel that you cannot enjoy anything, because your situation is so difficult and unpleasant.

example.ex: She's been very depressed and upset about this whole situation.
example.tran: 她对整个情形感到极其沮丧和不快。

entry.def: A depressed place or industry does not have enough business or employment to be successful.

example.ex: ...legislation to encourage investment in depressed areas...
example.tran: 鼓励向经济困难地区投资的法律法规

example.ex: The construction industry is no longer as depressed as it was.
example.tran: 建筑业不再像以往那样萧条了。

entry.def: A depressed point on a surface is lower than the parts around it.

example.ex: Acupressure is manual pressure applied to a specific slightly depressed point on the body.
example.tran: 指压按摩是用手按压人体某个轻微凹陷的穴位。

means.word_mean: 2. flattened downward as if pressed from above or flattened along the dorsal and ventral surfaces

sentences.sentence: "lonely and blue in a strange city"
"depressed by the loss of his job"
"a dispirited and resigned expression on her face"

means.word_mean: 4. having the central portion lower than the margin;

stems_affixes.value_cn: 可压缩的, 可压榨的
stems_affixes.word_buile: compress[v.压缩]+ible能……的→adj.可压缩的, 可压榨的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 沮丧的,抑郁的;不景气的,萧条的
stems_affixes.word_buile: depress[v.压制,压抑]+ed……的→adj.沮丧的,抑郁的;不景气的,萧条的
ex出+press挤压→把[思想]挤出来→表达

stems_affixes.value_cn: 给人深刻印象的,感人的
stems_affixes.word_buile: impress印象,引人注目+ive……的→adj.给人深刻印象的,感人的
press挤压+ing……的→adj.急迫的
compress[v.压缩]+ion表名词→n.压缩,压紧,浓缩
depress[v.压制,压抑]+ion表名词→n.消沉;不景气萧条期
ex出+press挤压→把[思想]挤出来→表达

stems_affixes.value_cn: 表达;表情;声调;腔调;榨出;措词;式;符号
stems_affixes.word_buile: express表达,表示+ion→n.表达;表情;声调;腔调;榨出;措词;式;符号
impress印象,引人注目+ion表名词→n.印象,感想;盖印,压痕
oppress[v.压迫,压制]+ion表名词→n.压迫

stems_affixes.value_cn: 压,压力,压迫,强制,紧迫,困苦,困难
stems_affixes.word_buile: press挤压+ure表名词→n.压,压力,压迫,强制,紧迫,困苦,困难
suppress[v.镇压,压制]+ion表名词→n.镇压,压制
press挤压→n.&n.&v.压, 按
com一起+press压→一起压→压缩
de向下+press压→向下压→压制→情绪低下
ex出+press挤压→把[思想]挤出来→表达
im进+press挤压→压进去→盖印→印入头脑→留下印象
op加强动作+press挤压→拼命压→压迫
re回+press挤压→压回去
sup下+press压→压下去

Sentence.sentence: Feeling empty, depressed or irritable when not at the computer.
People who struggle with excessive Internet use maybe depressed or have other mood disorders, Orzack said
After the Soviet Union's collapse, says Cherlin, "anxiety for the future" depressed birthrates in Russia and Eastern Europe.

means.word_mean: 精神不振的,忧伤的,消沉的

sentences.cn: 他看上去很沮丧,甚至于沮丧到想自杀。

sentences.en: He was really depressed about the business last week, but he’s all smiles now.A very big order has just come in.
sentences.cn: 上个星期他还为生意愁眉苦脸的,可是现在卻喜形于色,因为刚接到一笔大订单。

sentences.en: He was so depressed about his debts that he wanted to blow his brains out.
sentences.cn: 他为债务烦恼不已,恨不得一枪把自己结果了。
